content.en: Bus arrival prediction: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to predict bus arrival times and travel times. They have investigated the effectiveness of various algorithms, such as support vector machines (SVM), Kalman filtering, artificial neural networks (ANN), k nearest neighbours algorithm (k-NN), linear regression (LR), and more. These algorithms have shown promise in accurately predicting bus arrival and travel times, even under high variability conditions.
content.da: Busankomstprognose: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forudsige busankomsttider og rejsetider. De har undersøgt effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer som support vector machines (SVM), Kalman-filtrering, kunstige neurale netværk (ANN), k nærmeste nabo algoritme (k-NN), lineær regression (LR) og flere. Disse algoritmer har vist potentiale i at præcist forudsige busankomst- og rejsetider, selv under forhold med høj variabilitet.
